subject: Public Speaking
title: Creating Relatable Characters
description: A quick win: understand Creating Relatable Characters.

hook.text: Audiences connect with flawed, real people, not perfect heroes.

buildup.text: Describe characters with specific, humanizing details.

discovery.text: She always carried a blue notebook becomes more real than she was organized.

twist.text: The more specific the detail, the more universal the connection.

climax.text: Audiences need to see themselves in your characters.

punchline.text: Make characters specific. They become universal.
